member.name: IAppxBundleManifestPackageInfo2.GetIsDefaultApplicablePackage
member.summary: Determines whether the app package is a default applicable package.
member.param: True if the package is a default applicable package, False otherwise.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBundleManifestPackageInfo2.GetIsNonQualifiedResourcePackage
member.summary: Determines whether the app package is a non-qualified resource package.
member.param: True if the package is a non-qualified resource package, False otherwise.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBundleManifestPackageInfo2.GetIsPackageReference
member.summary: Determines whether a package is stored inside an app bundle, or if it's a reference to a package.
member.param: True if the package in the bundle is a reference to a package; False if the package in the bundle is stored inside the app bundle.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBundleManifestPackageInfo2
member.summary: Provides a read-only object model for a <Package> element in a bundle package manifest.
